zone.line: Of which I many years not remember,
You did enlighten the first guests
If of one you the others ( )
Of many images the artful rich magnifcence.
The drinkers duty himself rhymewise to explain,
At one stroke the hole to empty
Reminds me of many a young night,
I will now thee no neighbour reach,
I will my wit to thy art not shew,
Here is a juice which quickly drunk makes!
With a brown flood filled is this cavity.
Then I prepare, then I choose,
The last drink be now with my whole soul
(He places the goblet to his lips
The clang of Clock, & the Song of Chorus
